Good Comments: Nice quality, however Kaizoku is close to filling the gap that this group covered (as of 5.23.09), so I'd go with them if downloading for the first time.
Ugly and pointless karaoke effects on attack names, plus they leave in things like "yatta" and "yosh" which are perfectly translatable.
The subs are amazing with great TL Notes, & overall simply amazing. One of the best fansubbing groups I have ever seen. They might even be the very best.
Bad Comments: They use a horrible font which really detracts from he experience.  Their translations are OK.  It is definitely watchable but K-F is better for the episodes they cover
Was a very good sub; when it was around!
Bad font and half the time the translation is off.
